creditline: Lent by David and Flinnina Dewey
description: standing male figure on base; PL hand holding a shield, decorated with the face of a lion, that is resting on the ground and a sword resting in the crook of his PR arm bent at the elbow; figure wearing a pointed hat with brim and earflaps, glazed orange uniform with brown sleeves and boots
title: Warrior holding lion mask shield
